oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Some animals have' thoughts' (or 'understanding') and can talk as people do. According to ||kabbo (see p.891v), some animals stand upright like a man does. (Much of this story has not been translated.) ... a discourse upon the degrees of understanding possessed by various animals (L II.-8. 882-892). 1) Date on p.890: 21 November, 2) This story is found in Book II-8.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A discussion on the respective understanding and foolishnesses of various animals and some of their doings
